mapper.select: SELECT CL.id,CL.clubName, u.name as clubCeoName, CL.clubLocation, u.phone,categoryId, categoryName, CL.foundationDate, cS.instagramLink, cS.facebookLink ,cI.originalUrl FROM hguclub.club as CL ,hguclub.clubImage cI ,hguclub.category CA,hguclub.user u ,hguclub.clubSNS cS where CA.id = CL.categoryId and CL.userId = u.id and CL.id = cS.clubId and CL.id = cI.clubId and CA.id = #{categoryId} and cI.`order` = 1
